GSD.description:
gpu: lontium-lt9611: Fix NULL pointer dereference in lt9611_connector_init()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit 912f84e15e94ab87f5a7156aa1870090373d8304. For more details please see the references link.
